narrative: Fantasy managers, it's time to surprise the competition! Don't sleep on LaMelo Ball or De'Aaron Fox, producing an exciting 42.8 FP each, while Zion Williamson and Karl-Anthony Towns aren't far behind. Their performances could be your secret weapon. Looking for high upside value plays? Consider KJ Simpson, Alex Sarr, and Cam Spencer. They're not on everyone's radar, but their ceiling is high. Don't get left behind - hit that waiver wire and consider these overlooked contenders for today's fantasy lineup. They could be the difference-makers in your next matchup!
why: Data-driven insights from real NBA projections focusing on waiver wire and streaming opportunities
